sourcesContent:
User Dashboard

{{ currentUser.name }}

{{ currentUser.role }}

Welcome, {{ currentUser.name.split(' ')[0] }}!

Here's a look at your assigned projects and tasks.

Total Tasks

{{ getStats().totalTasks }}

Completed

{{ getStats().completedTasks }}

At Risk

{{ getStats().atRiskTasks }}

Overdue

{{ getStats().overdueTasks }}

My Tasks

{{ task.name }}

{{ task.startDate | date:'MMM d, y' }} - {{ task.endDate | date:'MMM d, y' }}

{{ task.status | titlecase }}
No tasks assigned to you.

My Projects

{{ project.name }}

{{ project.status | titlecase }}
No projects assigned to you.

{{ currentView }} Projects

{{ project.name }}

{{ project.status | titlecase }}

Select a project
